item.journeycreative.research_certificat: You need to research %s before you can research %s
item.journeycreative.research_vessel.too: Fill this container with items you want to research
container.ender_archive.research_blocked: You cannot create a research certificate for this item through the Ender Archive.
container.ender_archive.not_enough_items: The research vessel does not have enough items to create a research certificate.
gamerule.journeycreative.research_items_: The items needed to research other items are available in the journey menu without needing to unlock them, enabling instant access to item research without the associated crafting cost.
